Use Tailwind CSS (v3.3+) with `@tailwindcss/aspect-ratio` and `@tailwindcss/forms` plugins. Include minimal vanilla JS for scroll-triggered effects (no heavy libraries). Prioritize performance and mobile responsiveness. **Core Requirements:** 1. **Hero Section** - Animated gradient background that shifts between 3 vibrant marketing-themed colors (e.g., #6366f1 → #ec4899 → #8b5cf6) using CSS keyframes - 3D floating "proposal" card with `transform: translateZ()` on hover - Typewriter effect on headline: "Your Vision, Amplified" (with blinking cursor) 2. **Interactive Skill Showcase** - Grid of 6 skill cards (Branding, Social Media, etc.) - On hover: • Card lifts with `scale-105` + subtle shadow • Background gradient rotates 15deg • Icon pulses with `animate-ping` - **Color-sync effect**: Hovering any card changes the entire page's accent color to that card's theme color 3. **Animated Process Timeline** - Vertical timeline with 4 steps (Discover → Create → Launch → Grow) - Dots connected by animated SVG path that draws on scroll - Each step has: • Floating number badge with `animate-bounce` • Content that slides in from right on scroll (Intersection Observer) 4. **Dynamic Testimonial Carousel** - Auto-rotating testimonials with smooth fade transitions - Manual navigation arrows with ripple effect on click - Client avatars that tilt toward cursor (vanilla JS `mousemove`) 5. **Contact CTA with Micro-Interactions** - Gradient border that pulses on focus - Submit button with: • Hover: background gradient shift + icon slide-in • Click: confetti explosion (use lightweight canvas-based confetti) **Technical Specs:** - Use `scroll-behavior: smooth` for navigation - All animations must use `will-change: transform` for GPU acceleration - Implement prefers-reduced-motion: reduce - Mobile: Simplify animations (no hover states, reduced motion) - Include critical CSS in `\n\n\n \n \n \n \n
\n \n

\n \n
